extDesc.message: A Download Manager for Google Chrome

closeTooltip.description: on the download management page, when the mouse is moved over the button, the text prompt box stops showing

openDownloadFolder.description: open the download folder in Explorer

openSettings.description: open plugin settings in a new tab

dangerDescription.message: The file may harm your pc
dangerDescription.description: The file may harm your computer

erase.description: cancel download or clear file from list

openFolderNotification.description: Download completion notification open folder button

leftClickFileSetting.message: Open the file when clicking the file name with the left mouse button

rightClickFileSetting.message: Copy to clipboard when right click on file name

leftClickUrlSetting.message: Open the link when clicking the download link

rightClickUrlSetting.message: Copy to clipboard when right click on download link

showTooltipSetting.message: Display a prompt message when the mouse moves over the button

pluginSyncDetailedSetting.message: When you have logged in to your Google account, you can synchronize plugin settings between different Google Kernel-based browsers

notSyncSetting.message: This setting will not be synchronized

starAbout1.message: If you think this plugin is good, please go to the

version0_8_0.message: {"version": "0.8.0", "date": "2020-01-13","data": ["1. Add Ability to interrupt file re-download","2. optimization Interface display and operation flow when downloading dangerous files"]}

version0_7_0.message: {"version": "0.7.1", "date": "2020-01-01","data": ["1. Added notification during download","2. Added download completion tone","3. Chinese and English display of all pages"]}

version0_6_2.message: {"version": "0.6.2", "date": "2019-12-30","data": ["1. Added the function of right-click to copy file name and download link to clipboard","2. Added the function of displaying text prompts when the mouse moves to the button","3. Continue to improve Chinese and English display"]}

version0_5_1.message: {"version": "0.5.1", "date": "2019-12-13","data": ["1. When downloading a dangerous file, a prompt box will be displayed to confirm the download","2. Improve Chinese and English display"]}

version0_4.message: {"version": "0.4", "date": "2019-09-30","data": ["1. Download file percentage progress display","2. Download files can be paused, resumed, cancelled, deleted","3. Search all downloaded files"]}
